wikipedia_page.main: Frederic Westcott (died 1861) was an English botanist. He worked in close cooperation with George Beauchamp Knowles on the taxonomy of orchids.

link_mentions.page: List of botanists by author abbreviation (W–Z)

response: George Beauchamp Knowles (1790–1862) was an English botanist and a professor at the Royal School of Medicine and Surgery of Birmingham. He worked in close cooperation with Frederic Westcott on the taxonomy of orchids.
